name: AWSOME TOWER DEFENSE
description:
Simple Strategy Game, You can kill enemy balls by placing Tower defenses in the nodes.

* Enemies are coming as waves , Your lives will be showed in the Upper Area.

* You can place 3 different types of Turrets in the white nodes by selecting them,  You need to pay money.(You have initial money of 400/-, You can gain it by killing Enemy)

* You can place Tower Defenses and also you can sell it by clicking on them.

* By moving mouse or ASDW Keys for moving the Screen.

* Press ESC Key for pausing the Game.

* Lasers are more effective against fast moving Enemies.
